meta.name: viewport

meta.content: Prairie Shores is a pet-friendly apartment community in Chicago, IL
Prairie Shores in Chicago, IL offers Studio, 1, 2, or 3 bedroom apartments for rent. Browse the gallery, explore the amenities, and get more information on availability today.

meta.title: Prairie Shores is a pet-friendly apartment community in Chicago, IL

div.div: Breed restrictions include American Stafford-shire Terrier, Bullmastiff, Pit Bull, Chow, Presa Canario, Rottweiler, Doberman Pinscher, and German Shepherd. Any mix of the breeds listed are also prohibited.

a.aria-label: Get Directions to 2937 South King Drive Chicago, IL 60616
a.title: Get Directions

img.alt: Outside patio with people relaxing and also yoga
img.title: Outside patio with people relaxing and also yoga

div.p:
Imagine starting each day with panoramic views of Lake Michigan and capping it off with a walk along the nearby lakefront. Residents of Prairie Shores experience a life of sun, sky and stunning views in the Bronzeville neighborhood on Chicagoâs South Side. The five high-rise apartment buildings form a one-of-a-kind community. From its rich past to its current reimagining, Prairie Shores offers a life of comfort and leisure. Find your new home in one of our renovated or classic studio, one, two, or three bedroom, pet-friendly apartments with spacious layouts and expansive closets. Community amenities like a dog park, package room and business center offer daily conveniences.
The Hub at Prairie Shores is now open! The state-of-the-art amenity center features fitness areas, relaxation spaces, game room and community demonstration kitchen, shared workspaces and rooftop deck.
